overview:
Ryan Vartoogian is the CEO and founder of Spartan Internet Consulting Corp. in 1997. Spartan has client base of leading companies from around the US and has expanded locations from Lansing, Michigan to 4 offices throughout the US. Spartan Internet Consulting is now recognized as one of the leading providers of strategic Internet planning services. The company now employs 35 full time consultants, designers, and programmers.

Spartanâ€™s Internet strategic planning and implementation process is proven to effectively engage companies in aligning their corporate goals with a strong and accountable Internet Strategy. Spartan Internet offers three classes of services, Internet consulting, web development/custom programming and ongoing website performance optimization.

Spartan launched the first-ever Internet-wide Performance Index for the 2008 Presidential campaign, which predicted the election of President Obama 17 months in advance of the general election. The Spartan Internet Political Performance Index (SIPP Index) is comprised of over 650 quantitative factors measuring the level of support and how well each candidate is connecting with individuals across the Internet including that of social networks.

milestones.description: Distinguished Young Alumni of The Year - Michigan State University
